sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>sn_docker_spoke.DockerWebhookUtils</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Docker Webhook Utils</description>
        <name>DockerWebhookUtils</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var DockerWebhookUtils = Class.create();
DockerWebhookUtils.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},  

    getDecisionsubFlow: function(decisions) {
        gs.info("decision output =" + decisions.getValue("subflow"));
        var gr = new GlideRecord("sys_hub_flow");
        gr.get(decisions.getValue("subflow"));
        gr.next();

        var subFlowInternalName;
        subFlowInternalName = gr.getValue('internal_name');
        return subFlowInternalName;
    },

    subflowExecutionEvent: function(subFlowInputs, subFlowInternalName) {
        var subFlowName = 'sn_docker_spoke' + '.' + subFlowInternalName;
        gs.info("Docker Webhook Subflow executed = " + subFlowName);
        sn_fd.FlowAPI.startSubflow(subFlowName, subFlowInputs);
        return;
    },

    type: 'DockerWebhookUtils'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2021-06-24 17:20:02</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>1bd908cc1b09701009cbea48624bcbce</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>DockerWebhookUtils</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Docker Spoke" source="sn_docker_spoke">dcb0e1e4db075300dd14596e5e9619ca</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Docker Spoke">dcb0e1e4db075300dd14596e5e9619ca</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_1bd908cc1b09701009cbea48624bcbce</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2021-09-16 16:30:55</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
